data.prayer: Lord, stir the hearts of your people in the state of Girne to agree with you in prayer.
data.verse: I [Jesus] pray also for those who will believe in me through their message, that all of them may be one, Father, just as you are in me and I am in you. May they also be in us so that the world may believe that you have sent me.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Girne, Northern Cyprus
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, help the local leaders in Girne, Northern Cyprus not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, you desire to blot out the sins of the people of Girne, Northern Cyprus. You said, if they turn to you, you will dissolve their sins like mist.
data.verse: I have blotted out, as a thick cloud, your transgressions, and, as a cloud, your sins. Return to me, for I have redeemed you.

data.prayer: Father, your Word is essential for life and growth. Please challenge the 19,249 cultural Christians in the state of Girne to read your Word for themselves today.
data.verse: It is written: 'Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that comes from the mouth of God.'

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Lápithos
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Lápithos, Girne, Northern Cyprus.
Lord, like in the church of Antioch, where you gathered many prophets and teachers, please gather many prophets and teachers in the state of Girne, Northern Cyprus.
data.verse: Now in the church at Antioch there were prophets and teachers: Barnabas, Simeon called Niger, Lucius of Cyrene, Manaen (who had been brought up with Herod the tetrarch), and Saul.

data.prayer: Lord, help the people of Girne, Northern Cyprus to discover the essence of being a disciple, making disciples, and how to plant churches that multiply.
Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Girne, Northern Cyprus.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.
